abstract: Nuclear Regulatory Commission says that the North Anna nuclear reactors in Mineral, Virginia, appeared to have only suffered cosmetic damage from the August 2011 earthquake and will reopen within weeks.
snippet: The nuclear reactors shut down by the Aug. 23 earthquake on the East Coast, will probably be allowed to reopen within weeks, a senior official of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission said Friday.
lead_paragraph: The nuclear reactors shut down by the Aug. 23 earthquake on the East Coast, will probably be allowed to reopen within weeks, a senior official of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission said Friday.

headline.main: Virginia: Nuclear Reactors Expected to Reopen Soon
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Nuclear Reactors Expected to Reopen Soon
